tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteToEnergyMachinery (
  machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_name VARCHAR(50),
  operational_status VARCHAR(20),
  operation_hours INT,
  maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteToEnergyMachinery (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_type VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_due BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE OperationalData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    operating_temperature FLOAT,
    operating_pressure FLOAT,
    energy_production FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE machinery_operational_data (
  machinery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  pressure FLOAT,
  vibration FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machinery_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR,
  maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance_results (
  prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machinery_id INT,
  predicted_failure_date DATE,
  confidence_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE machine_data (
    machine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    vibration FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Machinery (
  machinery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machinery_name VARCHAR(255),
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_interval INT,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE OperationalData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machinery_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor1_value FLOAT,
  sensor2_value FLOAT,
  sensor3_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machinery_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
  technician_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Components (
  component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  component_name VARCHAR(255),
  machinery_id INT,
  last_replacement_date DATE,
  replacement_interval INT
);
